name: 794085cd-0f0c-57e4-8848-9b35c451c4fb
notes: This service provides filter absorption photometer measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Montsec, Spain (20170126 - 20180101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume absorption coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Montsec, Spain (20170126 - 20180101)
